EmailInputEdit: As a recommendation try to mount the Protection Tip on the scaner as soon as you finish an scan and before the scan go to the sleep mode (Light turn off).
Issue: Scanner do not take reference while doing an scan
Probing Questions (Add Info):
No related cases on CRM

Tiana do not know if the scanner was drop or hit.

This issue start on 04/17/2025 on the morning.

She said that she always mount the protection tip after doing an scan.
RC: The last calibration was 428 days ago (HW Test)
Solution: Start the hardware test Fused Image to do a manual calibration for the scanner
Step 1: Copy the hardware test on the cutomer's PC
Step 2: Start the fundamental test and Scanning test
Step 3: All the test pass without issues
Step 4: Open Unite again to do an scan test
Step 6: Give the recomendation to the customer to mount the protection tip after finish an scan to try to avoid this issue
Step 7: Issue resolved, no more assistance required
